position: Associate Director I EY M&A I Dubai

positions.subtitle: EY
positions.description: Coverage of strategic accounts for M&A origination and execution including strategic investments, exits and fund raising through private capital. End-to-end transaction management including evaluation, structuring, valuation, negotiation of term sheets and definitive agreements, managing the due diligence process and stakeholder management. Deal experience across Telecom, Consumer Technology, Fintech, Real Estate, Entertainment and Leisure industry across MENA
positions.title: Manager I Mergers and Acquisitions | Dubai
positions.description_html:
Coverage of strategic accounts for M&A origination and execution including strategic investments, exits and fund raising through private capital.

End-to-end transaction management including evaluation, structuring, valuation, negotiation of term sheets and definitive agreements, managing the due diligence process and stakeholder management.

Deal experience across Telecom, Consumer Technology, Fintech, Real Estate, Entertainment and Leisure industry across MENA

positions.subtitle: EY
positions.description: Responsible for liaising with corporate strategic clients and PE funds to understand business objectives and challenges. End to end transaction execution along with preparation of marketing collaterals and financial models. Identify industry specific operating metrics and key value drivers for clients.
